Murdered in 1851

Tick tock… Tick tock… Tick tock… Gore and mystery hides in every nook, every cranny of this novel. Readers, prepare to find yourself transfixed in a warp of time and terror. Unveil the mystery murderer and experience the mind-bending loops and twists this novel will tell! Read, as a group of teenage boys and girls take you on a journey back in time to find their people and mind-boggling mysteries yet to be solved through the Victorian era. Compose your minds as the intricate characters will take you through a terrifying, emotional, empathetic journey as they are put on the spot with hidden clues and abrupt problems… Are you ready? Are you?
